title: Githyanki Greatsword
content:
Githyanki Greatsword Uncommon 4~17 Damage 2d6 +1 Slashing+1d4 Psychic (Conditional) Githborn Psionic Weapon: When wielded by a githyanki this weapon deals an additional 1~4 Psychic damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Though heavily decorated and inlaid with rubies, the blade's sharp edge suggests its use isn't merely ornamental. Greatsword Two-Handed 2.7 130

Githyanki Greatsword

2d6 +1 Slashing+1d4 Psychic (Conditional)

Githborn Psionic Weapon: When wielde
